heading: HR00951
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD, AND HOUSE SPECIAL COMMITTEE ON FOOD SECURITY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, REGARDING THE POSSIBLE EXISTENCE OF A RICE SHORTAGE IN THE PHILIPPINES IF THE DIRECTIVE OF PRESIDENT RODRIGO DUTERTE TO TEMPORARILY HALT THE IMPORTATION OF RICE IS CARRIED OUT
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00951
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD, AND HOUSE SPECIAL COMMITTEE ON FOOD SECURITY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, REGARDING THE POSSIBLE EXISTENCE OF A RICE SHORTAGE IN THE PHILIPPINES IF THE DIRECTIVE OF PRESIDENT RODRIGO DUTERTE TO TEMPORARILY HALT THE IMPORTATION OF RICE IS CARRIED OUT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LOPEZ, MANUEL LUIS T.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-02
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-02-20
          -Suspended and scheduled for another committee hearing.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2017-05-16
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-05-08;
